participant_1.background:
I'm often a bit of a klutz, but I'm always trying to improve my coordination.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
my favorite subject in school was science.
I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings.
My family are avid cyclists as well

participant_2.background:
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.
i go visit them sometimes.
i went to college.
I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal.
i have a cat named seven of nine.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
That sounds cool! How did you get into that?
I was always into photography, and I love weddings!
Cool! I like to sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind. What's your favorite way to relax?
I spend time with my family and friends, or go for a ride on my boat.
Cool! I grow my own potatoes and experiment with new seasonings, and my family are avid cyclists as well.
That's awesome! My cat's name is Seven of Nine.
That's a cool name for a cat!
Thanks! I spent my birthday riding my boat and listening to folk metal. What's your favorite type of music?
I like folk metal too! I also like to listen to classical and rock music.
Nice! I like a lot of different types of music too.
Cool! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! It's nice to meet you!
